title: Shadow Toll
overview: A guild-controlled levy at Wormhole 3 that fluctuates with station tensions, known to favor vouched crews.
context: Merchants whisper that the gate narrows when a favor is owed. The toll foreman balances faction pressures and station needs.

variants.translator_notes: Prefer in-world phrasing over technical terms

from_canon: Fluctuating non-lethal pressure mechanism controlled by station leadership and guild interests.
